original: 報告！<color=#fff999>$country1</color>勢力對我軍將領<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>提出<color=#c0f5ff>招募</color>請求，該<color=#c0f5ff>將領已叛逃</color>…
text: Report! <color=#fff999>$country1</color> The forces make a request for <color=#c0f5ff>recruitment</color> to our generals <color=#fff999>$leader1</color>, the <color=#c0f5ff> The general has defected</color>...
